statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); cwd_display="${cwd/#$HOME/~}"; git_info=""; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$branch" ] && git_info=$(printf " \033[36m(\033[35m%s\033[36m)\033[0m" "$branch"); fi; ctx_used=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // empty'); ctx_remaining=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.remaining_percentage // empty'); ctx_info=""; if [ -n "$ctx_used" ]; then ctx_color="\033[32m"; [ "${ctx_used%.*}" -ge 75 ] && ctx_color="\033[33m"; [ "${ctx_used%.*}" -ge 90 ] && ctx_color="\033[31m"; ctx_info=$(printf " ${ctx_color}[ctx: %.0f%%]\033[0m" "$ctx_used"); fi; printf "\033[34m%s\033[0m%s%s \033[2m[\033[0m%s\033[2m]\033[0m" "$cwd_display" "$git_info" "$ctx_info" "$model"
